ne24:2.2: “Tasma rakkhitacittassa, sammasankappagocaro”ti idam satindriyam, satindriye gahite gahitani bhavanti pancindriyani.
ne24:2.3: “Sammaditthipurekkharo”ti sammaditthiya gahitaya gahito bhavati ariyo atthangiko maggo.
ne24:2.5: Sammaditthito hi sammasankappo pabhavati, sammasankappato sammavaca pabhavati, sammavacato sammakammanto pabhavati, sammakammantato sammaajivo pabhavati, sammaajivato sammavayamo pabhavati, sammavayamato sammasati pabhavati, sammasatito sammasamadhi pabhavati, sammasamadhito sammavimutti pabhavati, sammavimuttito sammavimuttinanadassanam pabhavati.
